verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H476>Elishama,<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H4410>royal,<s%> and the <S%H7227>princes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with him, <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

Then <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that were with him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him, <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> also <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were with him, even with <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that were <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> after he had <S%H4191>slain<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> it,

That there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> from <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> from <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and from <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> even <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> having their <S%H2206>beards<s%> <S%H1548>shaven,<s%> and their <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>rent,<s%> and having <S%H1413>cut<s%> themselves, with <S%H4503>offerings<s%> and <S%H3828>incense<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them, <S%H1058>weeping<s%> all <S%H1980>along<s%> as he <S%H1980>went:<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as he <S%H6298>met<s%> them, he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H935>Come<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam.<s%>

And it was so, when they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H7819>slew<s%> them, and cast them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> he, and the <S%H582>men<s%> that were with him.

But <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> among them that <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H4191>Slay<s%> us not: for we <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4301>treasures<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and of <S%H1706>honey.<s%> So he <S%H2308>declined,<s%> and <S%H4191>slew<s%> them not <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

Now the <S%H953>pit<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> had <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6297>dead<s%> <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of the <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H3027>because<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> was it <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> it with them that were <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

But when <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were with him, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> had <S%H6213>done,<s%>

Then they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him by the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are in <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were with <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were with him, then they were <S%H8056>glad.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> had <S%H7617>carried<s%> away <S%H7617>captive<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> <S%H5437>cast<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> and <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah.<s%>

But <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> from <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> with <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H5984>Ammonites.<s%>

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were with him, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H7725>recovered<s%> from <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> from <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> even <S%H1397>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>children,<s%> and the <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon:<s%>

And they <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H1628>habitation<s%> of <S%H3643>Chimham,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

<S%H6440>Because<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> for they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H6485>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
